input.sentences: to celebrate location | we decided to have a redneck party .
we started out by buying the crappiest beer we could find .
and then one of those random asian `` woo '' girls .

output.sentences: So the group of locals gathered for their usual Friday night fest.
Their incomes were limited so they bought some of the crappiest beer.
Bobby who knew he was charming set out to woo random girls.
He was not into his line very long before he realized the girl was his cousin.
He backed off because in conversation it was revealed that they were not only cousins but both were married.
